parameters.name: not-found
parameters.description: If this parameter is true then you will get 404 response

parameters.name: need-authorization
parameters.description: If this parameter is true then you will get 401 response

parameters.name: test-parameter
parameters.description: This parameter designed for demonstrate unprocesable entity response

404.description: We so sorry but you entity not exists.

401.description: You must remove need-authorization flag from input parameters for pass authorization.

422.description: Wrong input parameter. It must be integer

test-parameter: The test-parameter must be an integer.

get.description:
This request designed to demonstrate request with full annotation and response witch contain some data.
It has multi-line description witch will be displayed in Annotation Notes block of documentation.
It has custom summary, response code descriptions and parameters descriptions.
get.summary: Test Get Request with full annotations
